item.title: 2,000 mink released from Iowa farm in what trade group calls 'terrorist act'
item.description: An Iowa farmer is looking for hundreds of mink released in a break-in

item.title: State utility says private firm set to restart abandoned $9 billion nuclear project
item.description: South Carolina's state-owned utility is negotiating with Brookfield Asset Management to revive a nuclear power project abandoned eight years ago

item.title: Government shutdown continues to add to stress on air traffic controllers and disrupt flights
item.description: The ongoing government shutdown continues to disrupt flights and put pressure on air traffic controllers who are working without pay

item.title: Social Security recipients get a 2.8% cost-of-living boost in 2026
